Notes: mainly used to carry tubers (especially manioc) and fruits from the garden or forest
hit or strike a living being
such as a river or lake
push or lift a heavy load
rope or cord of any type
rub or massage a body part to alleviate pain
tie or secure a rope to an entity
wipe or clean oneself after defecating
